Game Mechanics

Sherlock of London is like a detective case, but instead of clues and suspects, you have 15 symbols rotating along three horizontal lines. It's a classic 5x3 slot game with typical online game mechanics. What sets it apart from other slot games are the bonus features you can unlock. It's like finding a secret passage in a mystery novel!

The bonus function activates after landing a combination. A magnifying glass appears and analyses one of the winning symbols, giving you three options: an expanding Wild symbol, a multiplier on your winnings from the Wild symbol, or free spins with a fixed Wild symbol. It's like having good cop-bad cop options, but you're the one in control.

Get Your Sleuthing On with These Special Features

Sherlock of London not only brings the brainy detective to life but also packs fun and unique features to keep you engaged. After hitting a winning combo, greener pastures await with the bonus function. You could activate an expanding Wild symbol that gives you even more ways to win, or a multiplier on the winnings from the Wild. But wait, there's more! Free spins with a fixed Wild symbol can also be triggered by finding three or more Scatter symbols. Speaking of which, the Scatters are easy to spot with Sherlock and Watson on a blue background. So hop on into the game and let Sherlock take you on a wild ride with these gametastic features!

Design and Graphics: Sleuthing Out the Look of Sherlock of London

Sharpen your magnifying glass before playing Sherlock of London by Microgaming, because the graphics are so impressive, you'll want to get up close and personal. Microgaming has outdone themselves with this game, creating animations that are both stylish and visually appealing. It's a game that looks the part and has a good chance of becoming an industry stalwart. The slot machine symbols are all drawn from the world of Sherlock Holmes, giving them a sense of familiarity that makes the game more enjoyable. However, the symbols could do with being more distinct from one another, but don't worry, you'll get used to it in no time once you start spinning.

Overall, the detective-themed graphics of Sherlock of London perfectly encapsulate the world of mystery and intrigue, and we think that's worth investigating.

Unlocking the Mystery of Free Spins

Who isn't a sucker for free stuff? Well, Sherlock of London knows just how to keep their players happy with their free spin feature!

Triggered by finding three Scatter symbols featuring Sherlock Holmes and Watson on a blue background, players are taken to the free spins mode where they can reap the rewards of a fixed Wild symbol. Seriously, who wouldn't want some extra winnings? It's like finding the jackpot in a mystery novel!

This game isn't stingy either, there are several opportunities for free spins so players can keep spinning those reels without breaking the bank. It's like they say, the best things in life are free...spins.

Get Your Detective On: Other Sherlock Holmes Themed Slot Games

If you're a fan of Sherlock of London's detective-themed slot game, then you'll definitely want to try out other Sherlock Holmes inspired games. I mean, why not extend your investigations, right?

There's Sherlock Holmes by IGT – I bet you can't wait to spin the mystery wheel and find endless clues! If that doesn't float your boat, then try Sherlock Mystery by Playtech. You'll be up against Moriarty in no time!

So many games, so little time, but this is your chance to get your detective on – and possibly even win some money while you're at it.
